data.title: Scooby-Doo! : winter wonderdog /
data.meta_description: Scooby-Doo and the gang face off against festive frights, frosty nights, and the ghost of Christmas, who wants to wish everyone a scary Christmas! And the gang unwrap a series of mysteries in order to stop a group of chilling crooks from stealing the spirits of the season.
